title: [K-12] Case-Based CDIO Curriculum Using Nursing Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic nursing theory and clinical practice experience
context.additional_context: Utilization of video simulations, discussion boards, and collaboration tools within an LMS.

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more evidence-based nursing interventions by analyzing diverse clinical scenarios.
Learners enhance simulation-based problem-solving skills through CDIO-stage (Conceive-Design-Implement-Operate) project execution.
Learners achieve 80% or higher proficiency in project-based assessments, including peer evaluations.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
